author: Glen Goffin
content: I love that the internet and blogs in particular provide a forum for discussion and even debate.  When it comes to artistic expression, it almost seems necessary that there be disagreement ... that fosters diversity and uniqueness.  As far as craft development, there is a lot to be learned from those who have great mastery so I'm always willing to listen even if it comes across a little bit arrogantly.
